name: Roger
text: I'm late for my flight and I cant find my wife

name: Roger
text: Ohhh mannnn, I don't know where she is...

name: You
text: Maybe she's in the bathroom? You should check there

name: You
text: Oh man. Hopefully she's on her way back. I hope you make it

name: Roger
text: I guess were not going to Bora Bora this year...
